PLAYER.TITLE: Email Template Placeholders - (Send Email to Player)
PLAYER.CASINOBONUSTRANSFERTOBONUSAMOUNT: Casino Bonus Transfer To Bonus Amount
PLAYER.CASINOBONUSTRANSFERFROMBONUSAMOUNT: Casino Bonus Transfer From Bonus Amount
PLAYER.CASINOBONUSMAXPAYOUTEXCESSAMOUNT: Casino Bonus Max Payout Excess Amount

REPORT.TITLE: Email Template Placeholders - (Send Full Report Via Email, Send Report Stats Via Email)
REPORT.NAME: Report Name

CREATE.TITLE: Player Report - Add
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Use the form below to create a player report

DOMAIN.NAME: Domain
DOMAIN.DESCRIPTION: The domain for this player report
DOMAIN.PLACEHOLDER: Select the domain for this player report

NAME.NAME: Name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: The name of this player report

DESCRIPTION.NAME: Description
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: A description of this player report

ALLFILTERSAPPLICABLE.NAME: All Filters Applicable
ALLFILTERSAPPLICABLE.DESCRIPTION: If checked, all filters must apply, otherwise one or more

PLAYERDATAPERIOD.NAME: Player Data Period
PLAYERDATAPERIOD.DESCRIPTION: The period of player data to accumulate for this report

PLAYERDATAPERIODOFFSET.NAME: Player Data Period Offset
PLAYERDATAPERIODOFFSET.DESCRIPTION: The Offset Based on the Player Data Period. For example, if Player Data Period is set to Day, set Player Data Period Offset to 1 for yesterday's data, 2 for data from two days ago, and so on. Similarly, if Player Data Period is set to Month, set Player Data Period Offset to 1 for last months data, 2 for data from two months ago, and so on.

ENABLED.NAME: Enabled
ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: The status of the report, enabled or disabled

DAYOFWEEK.NAME: Day of Week
DAYOFWEEK.DESCRIPTION: The day of week for the schedule
DAYOFWEEK.PLACEHOLDER: Select the day of the week

DAYOFMONTH.NAME: Day of Month
DAYOFMONTH.DESCRIPTION: The day of the month for the schedule
DAYOFMONTH.PLACEHOLDER: Select the day of the month

HOUR.NAME: Hour
HOUR.DESCRIPTION: The hour of day for the schedule

MINUTE.NAME: Minute
MINUTE.DESCRIPTION: The minute of the hour for the schedule

OPERATOR.NAME: Operator
OPERATOR.DESCRIPTION: The operator to use for filtration

XDAYSAGO.NAME: X Days Ago
XDAYSAGO.DESCRIPTION: The number of days ago. For example, 0 is today, 1 is yesterday, 2 is two days ago, and so on
XDAYSAGO.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the number of days ago

TYPE.NAME: Type
TYPE.DESCRIPTION: The type of action to perform

EMAILTEMPLATE.NAME: Email Template Name
EMAILTEMPLATE.DESCRIPTION: The email template to use for the action
